description: Ocean tracer diffusivity associated with parameterized eddy-induced advective transport. Sometimes this diffusivity is called the "thickness" diffusivity. For CMIP5, this diagnostic was called "ocean tracer bolus laplacian diffusivity".  The CMIP6 name is physically more relevant.
cell_methods: area: mean where sea time: mean
label: diftrblo_tavg-l-hxy-sea
